prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of an imposing, slender alien male, feline ears, calm confident expression, wearing ornate purple and gold Egyptian-inspired robes, human-like anatomy
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, deep volumetric lighting, realistic subtle purple skin texture, fine wrinkles around eyes, wet/oily look on the skin, high contrast, subsurface scattering
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, CGI, toy, plastic texture, smooth skin, pink color, bright purple, flat lighting, exaggerated ears, deformed anatomy, low quality
